00230 - (BOOL)isContinuous
00231 {
00232     // Some subclasses should redefine this with CPLeftMouseDraggedMask
00233     return (_sendActionOn & CPPeriodicMask) !== 0;
00234 }
00235 
00239 - (void)setContinuous:(BOOL)flag
00240 {
00241     // Some subclasses should redefine this with CPLeftMouseDraggedMask
00242     if (flag)
00243         _sendActionOn |= CPPeriodicMask;
00244     else 
00245         _sendActionOn &= ~CPPeriodicMask;
00246 }
00247 
00248 - (BOOL)tracksMouseOutsideOfFrame
00249 {
00250     return NO;
00251 }
00252 
00253 - (void)trackMouse:(CPEvent)anEvent
00254 {
00255     var type = [anEvent type],
00256         currentLocation = [self convertPoint:[anEvent locationInWindow] fromView:nil];
00257         isWithinFrame = [self tracksMouseOutsideOfFrame] || CGRectContainsPoint([self bounds], currentLocation);
00258 
00259     if (type === CPLeftMouseUp)
00260     {
00261         [self stopTracking:_previousTrackingLocation at:currentLocation mouseIsUp:YES];
00262         
00263         _trackingMouseDownFlags = 0;
00264     }
00265     
00266     else
00267     {
00268         if (type === CPLeftMouseDown)
00269         {
00270             _trackingMouseDownFlags = [anEvent modifierFlags];
00271             _continuousTracking = [self startTrackingAt:currentLocation];
00272         }
00273         else if (type === CPLeftMouseDragged)
00274         {
00275             if (isWithinFrame)
00276             {
00277                 if (!_trackingWasWithinFrame)
00278                     _continuousTracking = [self startTrackingAt:currentLocation];
00279                 
00280                 else if (_continuousTracking)
00281                     _continuousTracking = [self continueTracking:_previousTrackingLocation at:currentLocation];
00282             }
00283             else
00284                 [self stopTracking:_previousTrackingLocation at:currentLocation mouseIsUp:NO];
00285         }
00286         
00287         [CPApp setTarget:self selector:@selector(trackMouse:) forNextEventMatchingMask:CPLeftMouseDraggedMask | CPLeftMouseUpMask untilDate:nil inMode:nil dequeue:YES];
00288     }
00289     
00290     if ((_sendActionOn & (1 << type)) && isWithinFrame)
00291         [self sendAction:_action to:_target];
00292     
00293     _trackingWasWithinFrame = isWithinFrame;
00294     _previousTrackingLocation = currentLocation;
00295 }

00306 - (void)performClick:(id)sender 
00307 {
00308     [self highlight:YES];
00309     [self setState:[self nextState]];
00310     [self sendAction:[self action] to:[self target]];
00311     
00312     [CPTimer scheduledTimerWithTimeInterval:0.1 target:self selector:@selector(unhighlightButtonTimerDidFinish:) userInfo:nil repeats:NO];
00313 }
00314 
00315 - (void)unhighlightButtonTimerDidFinish:(id)sender
00316 {
00317     [self highlight:NO];
00318 }
00319 
00320 - (unsigned)mouseDownFlags
00321 {
00322     return _trackingMouseDownFlags;

00325 - (BOOL)startTrackingAt:(CGPoint)aPoint
00326 {
00327     [self highlight:YES];
00328     
00329     return (_sendActionOn & CPPeriodicMask) || (_sendActionOn & CPLeftMouseDraggedMask);
00330 }
00331 
00332 - (BOOL)continueTracking:(CGPoint)lastPoint at:(CGPoint)aPoint
00333 {
00334     return (_sendActionOn & CPPeriodicMask) || (_sendActionOn & CPLeftMouseDraggedMask);
00335 }
00336 
00337 - (void)stopTracking:(CGPoint)lastPoint at:(CGPoint)aPoint mouseIsUp:(BOOL)mouseIsUp
00338 {
00339     [self highlight:NO];
00340 }
00341 
00342 - (void)mouseDown:(CPEvent)anEvent
00343 {
00344     if (![self isEnabled])
00345         return;
00346     
00347     [self trackMouse:anEvent];
00348 }

00493 - (void)textDidBeginEditing:(CPNotification)note 
00494 {
00495     //this looks to prevent false propagation of notifications for other objects
00496     if([note object] != self)
00497         return;
00498 
00499     [[CPNotificationCenter defaultCenter] postNotificationName:CPControlTextDidBeginEditingNotification object:self userInfo:[CPDictionary dictionaryWithObject:[note object] forKey:"CPFieldEditor"]];
00500 }
00501

00503 {
00504     //this looks to prevent false propagation of notifications for other objects
00505     if([note object] != self)
00506         return;
00507 
00508     [[CPNotificationCenter defaultCenter] postNotificationName:CPControlTextDidChangeNotification object:self userInfo:[CPDictionary dictionaryWithObject:[note object] forKey:"CPFieldEditor"]];
00509 }
00510 
00511 - (void)textDidEndEditing:(CPNotification)note 
00512 {
00513     //this looks to prevent false propagation of notifications for other objects
00514     if([note object] != self)
00515         return;
00516 
00517     [[CPNotificationCenter defaultCenter] postNotificationName:CPControlTextDidEndEditingNotification object:self userInfo:[CPDictionary dictionaryWithObject:[note object] forKey:"CPFieldEditor"]];
00518 }

00520 #define BRIDGE(UPPERCASE, LOWERCASE, ATTRIBUTENAME) \
00521 \
00522 - (void)set##UPPERCASE:(id)aValue\
00523 {\
00524 [self setValue:aValue forThemeAttribute:ATTRIBUTENAME];\
00525 }\
00526 \
00527 - (id)LOWERCASE\
00528 {\
00529 return [self valueForThemeAttribute:ATTRIBUTENAME];\
00530 }
00531 
00532 BRIDGE(Alignment, alignment, "alignment")
00533 BRIDGE(VerticalAlignment, verticalAlignment, "vertical-alignment")
00534 BRIDGE(LineBreakMode, lineBreakMode, "line-break-mode")
00535 BRIDGE(TextColor, textColor, "text-color")
00536 BRIDGE(Font, font, "font")
00537 BRIDGE(TextShadowColor, textShadowColor, "text-shadow-color")
00538 BRIDGE(TextShadowOffset, textShadowOffset, "text-shadow-offset")
00539 BRIDGE(ImagePosition, imagePosition, "image-position")
00540 BRIDGE(ImageScaling, imageScaling, "image-scaling")

00542 - (void)setEnabled:(BOOL)isEnabled
00543 {
00544     if (isEnabled)
00545         [self unsetThemeState:CPThemeStateDisabled];
00546     else
00547         [self setThemeState:CPThemeStateDisabled];
00548 }
00549 
00550 - (BOOL)isEnabled
00551 {
00552     return ![self hasThemeState:CPThemeStateDisabled];
00553 }

00560 - (void)setHighlighted:(BOOL)isHighlighted
00561 {
00562     if (isHighlighted)
00563         [self setThemeState:CPThemeStateHighlighted];
00564     else
00565         [self unsetThemeState:CPThemeStateHighlighted];
00566 }
00567 
00568 - (BOOL)isHighlighted
00569 {
00570     return [self hasThemeState:CPThemeStateHighlighted];

00575 var CPControlValueKey           = "CPControlValueKey",
00576     CPControlControlStateKey    = @"CPControlControlStateKey",
00577     CPControlIsEnabledKey       = "CPControlIsEnabledKey",
00578     
00579     CPControlTargetKey          = "CPControlTargetKey",
00580     CPControlActionKey          = "CPControlActionKey",
00581     CPControlSendActionOnKey    = "CPControlSendActionOnKey",
00582 
00583     CPControlSendsActionOnEndEditingKey = "CPControlSendsActionOnEndEditingKey";
00584 
00585 var __Deprecated__CPImageViewImageKey   = @"CPImageViewImageKey";
00586 
00587 @implementation CPControl (CPCoding)
00588 
00589 /*
00590     Initializes the control by unarchiving it from a coder.
00591     @param aCoder the coder from which to unarchive the control
00592     @return the initialized control
00593 */
00594 - (id)initWithCoder:(CPCoder)aCoder
00595 {
00596     self = [super initWithCoder:aCoder];
00597 
00598     if (self)
00599     {
00600         [self setObjectValue:[aCoder decodeObjectForKey:CPControlValueKey]];
00601 
00602         [self setTarget:[aCoder decodeObjectForKey:CPControlTargetKey]];
00603         [self setAction:[aCoder decodeObjectForKey:CPControlActionKey]];
00604 
00605         [self sendActionOn:[aCoder decodeIntForKey:CPControlSendActionOnKey]];
00606         [self setSendsActionOnEndEditing:[aCoder decodeBoolForKey:CPControlSendsActionOnEndEditingKey]];
00607     }
00608     
00609     return self;
00610 }
00611 
00612 /*
00613     Archives the control to the provided coder.
00614     @param aCoder the coder to which the control will be archived.
00615 */
00616 - (void)encodeWithCoder:(CPCoder)aCoder
00617 {
00618     [super encodeWithCoder:aCoder];
00619 
00620     if (_sendsActionOnEndEditing)
00621         [aCoder encodeBool:_sendsActionOnEndEditing forKey:CPControlSendsActionOnEndEditingKey];
00622 
00623     if (_value !== nil)
00624         [aCoder encodeObject:_value forKey:CPControlValueKey];
00625 
00626     if (_target !== nil)
00627         [aCoder encodeConditionalObject:_target forKey:CPControlTargetKey];
00628 
00629     if (_action !== NULL)
00630         [aCoder encodeObject:_action forKey:CPControlActionKey];
00631 
00632     [aCoder encodeInt:_sendActionOn forKey:CPControlSendActionOnKey];
00633 }

00637 var _CPControlSizeIdentifiers               = [],
00638     _CPControlCachedColorWithPatternImages  = {},
00639     _CPControlCachedThreePartImagePattern   = {};
00640 
00641 _CPControlSizeIdentifiers[CPRegularControlSize] = "Regular";
00642 _CPControlSizeIdentifiers[CPSmallControlSize]   = "Small";
00643 _CPControlSizeIdentifiers[CPMiniControlSize]    = "Mini";
00644     
00645 function _CPControlIdentifierForControlSize(aControlSize)
00646 {
00647     return _CPControlSizeIdentifiers[aControlSize];
00648 }

00650 function _CPControlColorWithPatternImage(sizes, aClassName)
00651 {
00652     var index = 1,
00653         count = arguments.length,
00654         identifier = "";
00655     
00656     for (; index < count; ++index)
00657         identifier += arguments[index];
00658     
00659     var color = _CPControlCachedColorWithPatternImages[identifier];
00660     
00661     if (!color)
00662     {
00663         var bundle = [CPBundle bundleForClass:[CPControl class]];
00664     
00665         color = [CPColor colorWithPatternImage:[[CPImage alloc] initWithContentsOfFile:[bundle pathForResource:aClassName + "/" + identifier + ".png"] size:sizes[identifier]]];
00666 
00667         _CPControlCachedColorWithPatternImages[identifier] = color;
00668     }
00669     
00670     return color;
00671 }
00672 
00673 function _CPControlThreePartImagePattern(isVertical, sizes, aClassName)
00674 {
00675     var index = 2,
00676         count = arguments.length,
00677         identifier = "";
00678     
00679     for (; index < count; ++index)
00680         identifier += arguments[index];
00681 
00682     var color = _CPControlCachedThreePartImagePattern[identifier];
00683     
00684     if (!color)
00685     {
00686         var bundle = [CPBundle bundleForClass:[CPControl class]],
00687             path = aClassName + "/" + identifier;
00688         
00689         sizes = sizes[identifier];
00690 
00691         color = [CPColor colorWithPatternImage:[[CPThreePartImage alloc] initWithImageSlices:[
00692                     [[CPImage alloc] initWithContentsOfFile:[bundle pathForResource:path + "0.png"] size:sizes[0]],
00693                     [[CPImage alloc] initWithContentsOfFile:[bundle pathForResource:path + "1.png"] size:sizes[1]],
00694                     [[CPImage alloc] initWithContentsOfFile:[bundle pathForResource:path + "2.png"] size:sizes[2]]
00695                 ] isVertical:isVertical]];
00696                 
00697         _CPControlCachedThreePartImagePattern[identifier] = color;
00698     }
00699     
00700     return color;
00701 }
